title: Next Greater Element I
description: The next greater element of an element x in an array is the first greater element to the right of x. Given two arrays nums1 and nums2, where nums1 is a subset of nums2, return an array where each element is the next greater element of nums1[i] in nums2, or -1 if it does not exist.
constraints: All integers in nums1 and nums2 are unique
All integers of nums1 also appear in nums2
